data.name: Horsea
data.flavorText: Known to shoot down flying bugs with precision blasts of ink from the surface of the water.

data.name: Psyduck
data.flavorText: As a result of headaches so fierce they cause it to cry, it sometimes uses psychokinesis without meaning to.

data.name: Growlithe
data.flavorText: It's both clever and loyal, but if a stranger tries to invade its territory, it barks threateningly.

data.name: Pikachu
data.flavorText: A plan was recently announced to gather many Pikachu and make an electric power plant.

data.name: Slowpoke
data.flavorText: Its long tail often breaks off. It doesn't really feel any pain, though, and the tail grows back, so Slowpoke isn't particularly bothered.

data.name: Machop
data.flavorText: It loves working out. As it gazes at its muscles, which continue to swell day by day, it becomes more and more dedicated to its training.

data.name: Cubone
data.flavorText: When it thinks of its deceased mother, it weeps loudly. Mandibuzz that hear its cries will attack it from the air.

data.name: Chansey
data.flavorText: The eggs laid by Chansey are rich in nutrients and a favorite food of many Pokémon.

data.name: Magnemite
data.flavorText: It sends out electromagnetic waves, which let it float through the air. Touching it while it's eating electricity will give you a full-body shock.

data.name: Dratini
data.flavorText: After a 10-hour struggle, a fisherman was able to pull one up and confirm its existence.

data.name: Eevee
data.flavorText: Possessing an unbalanced and unstable genetic makeup, it conceals many possible evolutions.

data.name: Porygon
data.flavorText: Roughly 20 years ago, it was artificially created, utilizing the latest technology of the time.
